XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for MNet service plugin mnet/service/enrol

TABLE.NAME: mnetservice_enrol_courses
TABLE.COMMENT: Caches the information fetched via XML-RPC about courses on remote hosts that are offered for our users

FIELD.NAME: hostid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the remote MNet host

FIELD.NAME: remoteid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of course on its home server

FIELD.NAME: categoryid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the category on the remote server

FIELD.NAME: roleid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the role at the remote server that our users will get when we enrol them there

FIELD.NAME: rolename
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the role at the remote server that our users will get when we enrol them there

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: primary key of the mnet_course table

INDEX.NAME: uq_hostid_remoteid
INDEX.COMMENT: The id of the course on its host must be unique

TABLE.NAME: mnetservice_enrol_enrolments
TABLE.COMMENT: Caches the information about enrolments of our local users in courses on remote hosts

FIELD.NAME: hostid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the remote MNet host

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of our local user on this server

FIELD.NAME: remotecourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course at the remote server. Note that this may and may not be cached in our mnetservice_enrol_courses table, depends of whether the course is opened for remote enrolments or our student is the enrolled there via other plugin

FIELD.NAME: enroltype
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the enrol plugin at the remote server that was used to enrol our student into their course
